root.Grants: |root||root||ALTER|G |root||root||ALTER ROUTINE|G |root||root||CREATE|G |root||root||CREATE ROUTINE|G |root||root||CREATE TABLESPACE|G |root||root||CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES|G |root||root||CREATE USER|G |root||root||CREATE VIEW|G |root||root||DELETE|G |root||root||DROP|G |root||root||EVENT|G |root||root||EXECUTE|G |root||root||FILE|G |root||root||INDEX|G |root||root||INSERT|G |root||root||LOCK TABLES|G |root||root||PROCESS|G |root||root||REFERENCES|G |root||root||RELOAD|G |root||root||REPLICATION CLIENT|G |root||root||REPLICATION SLAVE|G |root||root||SELECT|G |root||root||SHOW DATABASES|G |root||root||SHOW VIEW|G |root||root||SHUTDOWN|G |root||mysql.session|localhost|SUPER|G |root||root||SUPER|G |root||root||TRIGGER|G |root||root||UPDATE|G |root||root||grant option|G performance_schema|schema||mysql.session|localhost|SELECT|G sys|schema||mysql.sys|localhost|TRIGGER|G

column.name: sort_num
column.Comment: 课程排序，用于后台保存草稿时用到

column.name: is_reply
column.Comment: 是否回复留言：0普通留言，1回复留言

column.name: type
column.Comment: 留言类型：0用户留言，1讲师留言，2运营马甲 3讲师回复 4小编回复 5官方客服回复

column.name: status
column.Comment: 留言状态：0待审核，1审核通过，2审核不通过，3已删除

column.name: is_notify
column.Comment: 是否发送了通知,1表示未发出，0表示已发出

column.name: replied
column.Comment: 回复状态 0 未回复 1 已回复

column.name: is_del
column.Comment: 是否删除，0：未删除（已赞），1：已删除（取消赞状态）

column.name: status
column.Comment: 课时状态,0-隐藏，1-未发布，2-已发布

column.name: duration_num
column.Comment: 时长，秒数（主要用于音频在H5控件中使用）

column.name: status
column.Comment: 状态，0:隐藏；1：待更新；2：已发布

column.name: currency
column.Comment: 货币类型，cny-人民币 gbeans-勾豆

column.name: channel
column.Comment: 支付渠道：weChat-微信支付，aliPay-支付宝支付,applePay-苹果支付

column.name: status
column.Comment: 订单状态：1-未支付 2-支付成功 3-支付失败 -1-订单失效

column.name: platform
column.Comment: 支付所使用的平台：1 拉勾 2 拉勾教育

column.name: wx_type
column.Comment: 微信类型, 参考自lg-wechat-boot项目中的wxinfo

index.name: idx_goods_order_no
index.Comment: 根据商品订单编号来查询

column.name: password
column.Comment: 用户密码（可以为空，支持只用验证码注册、登录）

column.name: status
column.Comment: 用户状态：ENABLE能登录，DISABLE不能登录

column.name: course_id
column.Comment: 课程id，根据订单中的课程类型来选择

column.name: source_type
column.Comment: 订单来源类型: 1 用户下单购买 2 后台添加专栏

column.name: status
column.Comment: 当前状态: 0已创建 10未支付 20已支付 30已取消 40已过期
